name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VRooms - Test Figma Designs in VR

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Design for VR without the pain of compiling and running code or VR programs. View your Figma designs in VR.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VRooms lets you design virtual reality user interfaces right in Figma, without the need for a headset or working in a VR environment. There's no coding, no compiling, and you can share your designs with anyone for user feedback and testing. VRooms is like Invision for VR. Use this Chrome Extension to create new designs as well as view your existing VRooms files in VR or update an existing design.
